page.title: 02THE WORK OF THE PEOPLE
page.content: To find out the work that people do, we used our own parents' work as a sample.The children in the school belong to 28 families.10 mothers are fulltime housewives although some do seasonal agricultural work.8 parents are farmers or farm workers & 3 work for a agricultural machinery firm in Spilsby.5 parents are teachers,2 are solicitors & one is an estate agent.3 parents work in small factories making clothes etc.3 mothers do office work in Spilsby and another is a bank clerk One parent is a builder,another is a painter and decorator,and a third is an electrcian.2 parents drive buses. One is a fire brigade officer & one is a council road worker.One mother is a shop assistant,2 work at a bakers,one father works at the hospital,one repairs clock,one is in the Royal Navy nad another works on an oil rig.
